Classes
Class
Description
ActivityWebSocketHandler
A WebSocket handler to manage client connections and broadcast messages.
AppConfig
Configuration class for application-level settings.
BackendApplication
Entry point for the Real-Time Ticketing System Backend Application.
Configuration
Represents the configuration settings for the ticketing system.
ConfigurationManager
Manages the configuration settings for the ticketing system.
Customer
Represents a customer in the ticketing system.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for managing application-wide exceptions.
ServletInitializer
Configures the Spring Boot application to be deployed in a traditional servlet container.
Ticket
Represents a ticket in the ticketing system.
TicketPool
Manages the ticketing system, serving as a shared resource for vendors and customers.
TicketSystemController
REST controller for managing the ticketing system.
Vendor
Represents a vendor in the ticketing system.
WebSocketConfig
WebSocket configuration class for enabling and registering WebSocket handlers.
